attributes.action: Change the law so that convicted foreign EU criminals can be stopped from re-entering the UK
attributes.additional_details: Criminals convivcted in the the UK are deported back to  their EU countries but because of freedom of movement cannot be blocked from returning and committing more crimes. The police are wasting time and money chasing criminals from EU countries, which have to prosectuted (again costing the CPS money) and all it is wasted becuase they thy then come back to the UK. Once they are convicted they should be banned from the UK.
